pages.text: Looking for a trash can? Well, Thermal Expansion's nullifier is what you're looking for. While it's may not be your average trash can, it gets the job done just like normal.$(br2)$(italic)Something to note:$() if you connect pipes directly onto the nullifier, the items will automatically be deleted. However, if you place the items inside the nullifier by hand, you will then need to press
the trash can icon to delete them.$(br2)Additionally, you can use a Thermal item filter to filter the items you want into the nullifier (or the ones you don't want).
